component.name: Selkie
component.summary: A markdown viewer with GFM support and Mermaid chart rendering

description.p: Selkie is a Zig-based GUI markdown viewer that supports GitHub Flavored Markdown (tables, task lists, strikethrough, autolinks), natively renders Mermaid diagram syntax, and offers customizable theming. It uses raylib for hardware-accelerated rendering and cmark-gfm for standards-compliant markdown parsing.
